_setup_instructions.1_home_path: Replace all {{HOME_PATH}} with your actual home directory (e.g., /Users/username). Do NOT use ~
_setup_instructions.2_project_name: Replace {{PROJECT_NAME}} with your project folder name (e.g., my-app)
_setup_instructions.3_knowledge_repo: Global knowledge repo auto-detected at ~/.claude/knowledge (no config needed). Add KNOWLEDGE_REPO_PATH only for project-specific overrides.
